dataIdInfo.idPurp: This dataset contains topographic sections generated for the Mexico Basin, providing elevation profiles across various transects. These sections are intended for use in hydrogeological and geospatial analysis, offering insights into terrain variations and the overall topography of the region.
dataIdInfo.idAbs:
The topographic sections in this dataset were derived from a Digital Elevation Model (DEM) and are aimed at studying the Mexico Basin's terrain characteristics . The sections represent cross-sectional profiles that capture the variation in elevation across the basin at specific transects. These sections can be used for hydrogeological modeling, geospatial analysis, and terrain assessment.

Each section was generated with precision to ensure the accurate representation of the topographic features, providing valuable data for understanding the geological and hydrological dynamics of the region. The data can be integrated into various GIS platforms for further spatial analysis and modeling.
